name: SCXML to VoiceXML app
tagline: Automaton to VoiceXML app for school project.
body:
### Welcome to our school project page.

### Current Work
Currentyl, out utility is at the finishing stage! It is almost done.

### Wiki directory for more information
* [AppServlet Documentation for pb138.web.AppServlet](https://github.com/durajkaDusan/PB138_SCXML2VoiceXMLWJ/wiki/AppServlet---Documentation-for-pb138.web.AppServlet)
* [Transformer Documentation for pb138.transformer](https://github.com/durajkaDusan/PB138_SCXML2VoiceXMLWJ/wiki/Transformer---Documentation-for-pb138.transformer)
* [Project Scheme](https://github.com/durajkaDusan/PB138_SCXML2VoiceXMLWJ/wiki/Project-Scheme)
* [Screenshots](https://github.com/durajkaDusan/PB138_SCXML2VoiceXMLWJ/wiki/Screenshots)
* [Developers](https://github.com/durajkaDusan/PB138_SCXML2VoiceXMLWJ/wiki/Developers)

### Project Goal
Goal of our project is to create a web application that would allow users to upload a file with SCXML automaton and obtain an automaton changed to VoiceXML format and a grammar from original automaton in SRGS format. 

### Tools
+ NetBeans IDE
+ Apache Tomcat 8
+ Java 7

### Out Team and our Jobs
* Dušan Ďurajka - Leading team, web application development, 
* Jana Szabadošová - CSS, HTML+JSP pages, github wiki + page, main presentation, help with WebApp 
* Filip Kejnar - Transformation from XML to VoiceXML
* Milan Špičuk - UML diagrams, Transformation implementation to Java
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
